title: Price ceiling on graph with letter areas

content.description: The following questions refer to the diagram below.The letters on the graph represent enclosed areas.
content.question: If a price ceiling is set at P1, which of the following areas represent the resulting consumer surplus, producer surplus, and deadweight loss?

choices.label:
Consumer Surplus
 Producer Surplus
 Deadweight Loss

f
 k
 l + m

Consumer Surplus
 Producer Surplus
 Deadweight Loss

f + g + h
 k + l
 h + j

Consumer Surplus
 Producer Surplus
 Deadweight Loss

f + g + h
 i + j + k
 l + m

Consumer Surplus
 Producer Surplus
 Deadweight Loss

f + g + i
 k
 h + j

Consumer Surplus
 Producer Surplus
 Deadweight Loss

f + g + i
 h + j
 l + m

content.answer:
Consumer Surplus
 Producer Surplus
 Deadweight Loss

f + g + i
 k
 h + j
